body.name: K'nex Beginner 40 Model Building Set - 141 Parts - Ages 5 & Up - Creative Building Toy, Multi, 141 K'NEX Parts and Pieces,Includes Instruction Booklet

features: Easy build parts: new parts designed specifically for 5 year old builders allows them to build on a flat, 2D surface, then sandwich The flat builds together into a 3D creation!
This beginner building set includes 141 parts, including K'NEX rods and connectors which are manufactured in a zero-waste, landfill-free facility in Pennsylvania
Build & rebuild: instructions and ideas for 40 different models are included, like a car, a skyscraper, an airplane, a rowboat, and so much more!
Stem learning fun: building with K'NEX helps strengthen fine motor skills, manual dexterity, and spatial awareness; putting them on a path towards a greater understanding of STEM subjects.
K'nex rods and connectors are responsibly made in America at a landfill-free, zero-waste green manufacturing facility in Hatfield, Pennsylvania.
body.description: Building with K'NEX is easier than ever, with the beginner 40 Model building set! Featuring all new easy-build parts that allow children ages 5 and up to have a frustration-free building experience. The new parts – a barbell shaped rod that easily sandwiches between 2 connectors, and a flat panel piece that provides structural support – were specifically designed to address the needs of younger builders, who can easily build 2 flat shapes and then connect them together into a 3-D creation! Plus, newly designed wheels pop right on – they'll be on the go in no time! This set contains 141 parts and easy-to-follow, step-by-step building instructions and ideas for 40 different models. Your little Builder can also use the Parts to design and create from their own imagination! Packaged in a sturdy suitcase-style box with a handle for easy clean-up and portable storage. Building with K'NEX supports a child's developmental growth and puts them on a path towards a better understanding of STEM subjects. As they fit the pieces together, They're developing spatial awareness and honing their fine motor and dexterity skills. Give your child the gift of creativity with K'NEX and think outside the blocks!

Featuring all new easy-build parts that allow children ages 5 and up to have a frustration-free building experience. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my three grandchildren ages 3, 4 and 5. Only my 5 year old has been able to play with it so far. We he got it out the first time, I swear he must've played for 2 1/2 hrs! I built pals with him off and on, too. This is a very flexibly creative set. He has since enjoyed making all the pals - they are pictured on a little poster inside the box and on the back of the box. He's also made up his own. Awesome toy set!

reviews.reviewText: I just bought this as a birthday present for my friend’s 4 year old boy. He absolutely loves this K’nex set and even managed to build the little car in the picture all by himself! I’d say this gift was a win!These kits a great for kids and it promotes creativity and building skills. I remember playing with these when I was a kid too and I loved them! I would highly recommend these K’nex kits!
My husband loves these hahaha fun for all ages

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great construction set. Love that it has plans for more than 1 figure.

Unsere Kinder (3 und 5) lieben die Kid Knex und bauen sehr gerne damit. Jüngere Kinder konstruieren meist frei, aber ab 4/5 J können auf jeden Fall schon die ersten leichteren Bauwerke alleine nach Anleitung gebaut werden. Der Kreativität sind keine Grenzen gesetzt- leider nur durch die Anzahl der Teile, die durchaus mehr sein könnten. Die Anleitung (keine Schritt für Schritt) ist für mich ein großer Pluspunkt. Die verschiedenen Abbildungen fordern auch ältere Kinder heraus und bieten zahlreiche Ideen und Vorschläge, damit es nicht langweilig wird. Das Material ist robust und für Kinderhände gut zu bedienen (Achtung: Stecker müssen seitlich eingesteckt werden; sonst klappt es nicht). Wenn man den Dreh raus hat, ein vielseitiges Spielzeug, das mitwächst.Wir sind begeistert und wundern uns, dass die Knex nicht schon bekannter sind.Absolute Empfehlung ab 3 Jahren und ein prima Geschenk!

reviews.reviewerName: Super mooie doos .. hier al veel mee gespeeld

reviews.reviewText: Excelente para que las criaturas exploren. Tiene figuras que permite ir subiendo la dificultad, si logras cuidar que no se pierdan las piezas, será diversión y aprendizaje en diferentes etapas.Me gustaría que trajera una referencia de dónde descargar el manual para armar figuras. El que trae es muy frágil.
